sqlMap.statement:
SELECT ROWNO AS "ROWNO", BjobBzwkDstcd AS "BJOBBZWKDSTCD", BjobBzwkName AS "BJOBBZWKNAME", ThisMsgUseYn AS "THISMSGUSEYN" , ThisMsgRegsntID AS "THISMSGREGSNTID", ThisMsgRegiHMS AS "THISMSGREGIHMS", ThisMsgAmndrID AS "THISMSGAMNDRID", ThisMsgAmndHMS AS "THISMSGAMNDHMS" FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY BjobBzwkDstcd) ROWNO, BjobBzwkDstcd , BjobBzwkName , ThisMsgUseYn , ThisMsgRegsntID, ThisMsgRegiHMS , ThisMsgAmndrID , ThisMsgAmndHMS FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIBJ02
UPPER(BjobBzwkDstcd) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#searchbjobBzwkDstcd#) || '%'
BjobBzwkName LIKE '%' || #searchbjobBzwkName# || '%'
) TMP WHERE ROWNO BETWEEN #startNum# AND #endNum#
